introSection.title: Make Every Date Night a Hit

intro.heading: Fun and Unique Date Ideas Await!
intro.paragraph: Whether it’s a cozy night in or an exciting outing, EPL has your date night covered. Watch a movie, try a new recipe, or enjoy something special, all at no cost.

access.heading: The Best Date Nights Come with More Value!
access.paragraph: Your EPL card can turn any evening into a memorable experience, without the high price tag. Last year, thousands of Edmontonians borrowed items that were perfect for date night. With your card, you can:
list: Borrow a cookbook to make a gourmet meal together, or better yet, attend one of our cooking classes!
Stream a romantic movie or binge-worthy series with no subscription fees.
Check out our trivia nights for fun and interactive evenings.
Find concerts, art exhibits, and other exciting events happening at EPL.
Immerse yourself in new Crafts and Hobbies events and make the perfect gift for your partner.
access.paragraph2: Never run out of date ideas—get your EPL card now!

customerStories.heading: Customer Stories
customerStories.quote: EPL is a great place to get ‘things’ done. I can keep in touch with friends on Facebook, check my emails, take free courses to upgrade my skills to add to my resume. I also have a lot of fun downloading recipes to cook at home.
customerStories.author: Lorraine C

whyGetEPLCard.heading: Why Get an EPL Card?
whyGetEPLCard.paragraph: An EPL card gives you the freedom to access premium content without the price tag. Whether you’re a digital creator, freelancer, or just love to try new things, EPL has what you need to stay connected.

card1.heading: ONLINE RESOURCE
card1.content: Cook, learn, and have fun together with interactive cooking classes at the Stanley A. Milner Library. Perfect for date night, these hands-on sessions will bring the heat in the best way.

card2.heading: ONLINE RESOURCE
card2.content: Skip the theatre and stop by the library for your next movie night. From indie flicks to hidden gems, enjoy a cozy, budget-friendly night out with films that make for great post-movie conversations.

card3.heading: ONLINE RESOURCE
card3.content: Plan a romantic night in with flavours from around the world. Explore thousands of international recipes, cultural insights, and drink pairings with everything you need to cook up an unforgettable evening together.

card4.heading: ONLINE RESOURCE
card4.content: Level up your date night with a creative twist. Bring your partner and enjoy some quality time making something by hand. Each week features a new project and a chance to connect in a fun, relaxed setting.

questions.title: What do I need to get a library card?
questions.text:
Getting your EPL card is simple. Visit any EPL location with identification (Drivers’ License, Alberta Health Care Card, etc.) and proof of Edmonton address in hand or signup online for a 45-day temporary card to start experiencing some of the benefits of EPL membership before visiting a branch to get a full membership.
If you're under 18, your parent or guardian must sign for you, and they'll be responsible for what you borrow.

questions.title: Do I need a library card to access the eBooks and online resources?
questions.text: We license our digital content from a number of companies (library vendors). The vendors require us to only allow our customers to access their products. For most products we are only licensed for the citizens of Edmonton. Your library card confirms your identity for the library vendors websites.

questions.title: Do University and College Students qualify for library cards?
questions.text:
Yes, and Library cards are free for all Edmonton Residents! Some schools even allow you to use your student card as your EPL card! This is called an L-Pass.
  • U of A students and faculty - access EPL free with U of A L-Pass.
  • MacEwan University students, staff and faculty - access EPL free with MacEwan L-Pass.
  • Concordia University College students and faculty - access EPL free with Concordia L-Pass (does not work in IE8 or earlier).
  • Norquest students - access EPL free with Norquest L-Pass.
  • King's University students - register here with your King's University library card number and PIN.
